content: hey, I didn't know how to reproduce this, so I didn't know how to file a bug report, but I just found an interesting(?) bug where if cargo check fails (I think I had somehow compiled some dependencies with one toolchain, then the rest with another) then you get no cargo-check diagnostics, and no error. Is it supposed to be like this? Do you have any advice on how I could isolate the problem so I can make a proper bug report?

error[E0514]: found crate stable_deref_trait compiled by an incompatible version of rustc
was the msg: running cargo clean then rebuilding everything fixed it.
